descriptionHtml:
What happens when a god ceases to be a god?  What happened to Vivec?  Is Talos still a Divine if people stop worshiping him?  Did the Nerevarine retire from Reincarnation?  The elderly Dunmer scholar Solyn Vilmasi wishes to know the fate of ex-gods before he passes into the beyond.  Will you learn the history of the rise and fall of divinity and set the old man\'s mind at ease?

Katatheosis is a lore-driven adventure that adds about a dozen dungeons and areas to explore.  It is lore-friendly and lets TES ambiguities remain ambiguous.  Meet some old friends and make some new ones.
author: Qutayba
